name: Crazy Saloon VR
description: Crazy Saloon VR : The Virtual Saloon Experience. Discover the Old West with this quirky saloon simulator built for HTC Vive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 Ti DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
